title: Seeking a New Beginning
description: Jayden Bradley has been burying himself in work for the last six months, trying to come to terms with being a single father and the sudden death of his daughter’s mother. His parents have been his saving grace but it’s time for them to move home. The pressures of running a business and raising a daughter alone are taking their toll and his best friend decides to hire him a nanny.The only problem, is that he has already slept with her.Ashley Evans has escaped the only life she has even know, thrust into a crazy new world, she struggles to adapt but spends the first night of her new life having the most mind-blowing sex she has ever experienced with a beautiful stranger.Three months later, her first enjoyable sexual experience just so happens to be with her new boss.Seeking a New Beginning is the fifth instalment in the For Keeps series but can be read as a standalone. Due to its explicit content, bad language and graphic sexual content, Seeking a New Beginning is recommended for mature readers of eighteen years and above.
author: Alexa  Kane
